Generation VIII.Sword: The faster a Thwackey can beat out a rhythm with its two sticks, the more respect it wins from its peers.
Generation VIII.Shield: When it's drumming out rapid beats in battle, it gets so caught up in the rhythm that it won't even notice that it's already knocked out its opponent.

Generation IX.Scarlet: It skillfully uses its two sticks not only for drumming out rapid beats but also for pummeling opponents during battle.
Generation IX.Violet: It becomes intensely focused while it drums out vigorous beats—so much so that sometimes it won’t listen to its Trainer’s commands.
